attributes.action: Allow help to new parents that work. In regards to benefits and child care
attributes.background: There are new parents all around Britain who work to the bone to try and take care of the families and still struggle whilst those who do not work have all the help. I myself are one of these working parents. And I'm trying to get help for those who are in the same situation

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help new parents who are in work.
